"Funniest" example of begging gettin you sex for now reason, https://nhentai.net/g/254277/ , NTR story were some guys peeping on a wife and her husband having sex in the bathhouse they run, the guys are their employees. Then one of them goes to blame the wife for giving him a hard-on and tries to rape her but outside of normal hentai trope the wife is actually strong and beats the guy down saying she'll never sleep with him. Few pages later of him begging her over and over and blameing her for giving him an erection out of the blue she just goes all sure I'll have sex with you so it goes away. Then the dude takes pictures + blackmails her and then uses it to force her to have sex with all the employee's until she completely broken and becomes their sex slave pretty much. So yeah....

Not sure why ppl are calling this incest when she's not the kids mom, she's the step-mom. So on the incest front it should be a-okey would be inseki (sex with step-siblings/mother/father someone your related to but not by blood) at most. Also the friend dang you see his mom once and then you run to beg having sex with her the next day and for some reason this always works in hentai even when the person say's no just keep on begging and you'll get through. Then the kid just stands there and watches while jerking of instead of knocking on the door or something to make em stop, if there is a follow up which I doubt pretty sure it'll be more of the kid watching and the wife falling for the friend. The ending even implies the friend will get to screw her more in the future while the kid will just keep on watching while jerking off.
